spiritsExplanation:
The workout is classified as 'High-Energy & Intense' due to the description emphasizing 'exert power' and a 'rate capped race,' suggesting a demanding, fast-paced session. The intensity level is 3 out of 3, indicating a high-energy workout, and the use of 90s Hip Hop and Global Hits suggests an invigorating musical accompaniment, leading to a score of 0.85 for this spirit.

The 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit is relevant because the exercise is conducted on a natural waterway, as evidenced by the image showing a person rowing outdoors. This setting adds an adventurous layer to the workout, scoring 0.7.

The workout also has a 'Structured & Disciplined' component since it follows a specific protocol ('rate capped race') and focuses on accumulating 'maximum meter,' pointing towards an organized and precise training style. This earns a score of 0.6.

The 'Soothing & Restorative' and 'Flow & Rhythm' spirits were excluded due to the focus on power and intensity rather than rhythm or relaxation.
